ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Computer Question
ygData.msgSnippet: Some DSL companies have things rigged to actually prevent networking. MSN dsl does not support it and it also really sucks. I had a very bad experience with
ygData.messageBody:
Some DSL companies have things rigged to actually prevent networking. MSN
dsl does not support it and it also really sucks. I had a very bad
experience with them when I was in Spokane.
luv,
-Su

If I recall when you get DSl yoiu normally get the equip,emt with it.
When I went with DSL though the phone company I get a router that besides my
computer I can hook up 3 other computers though the back and it only cost me
$5/month. I use Qwest. net asd Qwest is also the phnone company as well.
It is a nice setup. Check with who you are going to use DSL with and see
what they say as welll.


Justin
